There are more free apps for you to enjoy in about button.Existing infrared remote controls could be used to control PC applications. Any application that supports shortcut keys might be controlled via IR remote controls from other home devices. Connection can be made via serial port, USB port or motherboard IrDA connector. Such devices might be commercially available but can be home made using low cost micro controllers.
